title: TicTacToe Multiplayer App
description: Created and Developed a TICTACTOE multiplayer application, which allows two players to play TIC TAC TOE game online from any where.

title: Admin App
description: Created and Developed an Admin App, which allows the admin to perform CRUD operations on posts with the help of RestAPI nodejs server and MySQL DB to save the data.
skills: ReactJs, NodeJs, MySQL, RestAPI, HTML, CSS

title: Weather Application
description: Developed a web application, using an API, that displays the weather status of a city for every hour of the current day based on the user input.

title: Algorithm Visualizer
description: Developed a web application that gives the user a deep understanding about how the algorithms like sorting, searching, seive etc works, with the help of different array sizes at different speeds based on the users interest.

title: TextFile Compressor and Decompressor
description: Developed a web application, that compresses the text file using Huffmann Encoding and Decoding which was implemented using Min Heap

title: Food Order App
description: Developed a food order application which allows the user to add the desired food items to the cart and ordering them.

title: Snake Game
description: Created the popular snake game, that we always choose to play in our free time.

title: Todo List App
description: Developed a simple Todo application, to keep track of the daily activities from time to time.

title: Contact List App
description: Created a contact list application which allows the user to add to the list and search the details of a person in the list.

title: Book List Application
description: Designed a Book List Application that allows user to add all the favourite books at one place.

title: City Search Application
description: Designed a City Search Application that allows user to search for the desired city in India to know the location of that city.
